DataElement.preferredName: Additional Information Consultation Flag Yes No Coded Indicator
DataElement.preferredDefinition: Numeric code to signify whether consult(s) documents were added to an expedited adverse event report.

DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: Added; extra; further.:Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication._A conference between two or more people to consider a particular question; the act of deliberating together; confering with another researcher, physician, or expert about an issue or a case.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: Added; extra; further.:Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

Concepts.definition: Knowledge derived from study, experience, or instruction that has been gathered or received by communication.

Property.preferredDefinition: A conference between two or more people to consider a particular question; the act of deliberating together; confering with another researcher, physician, or expert about an issue or a case.:An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

Concepts.definition: A conference between two or more people to consider a particular question; the act of deliberating together; confering with another researcher, physician, or expert about an issue or a case.
An indicator that can be set or unset in order to signal whether a particular condition is true.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Default Conceptual Domain for UML Loader

DataElementConcept.changeDescription: 8/5/12 - Released as part of caAERS v2.0 model cleanup; caAERS v1.0 retired.  jc

ValueDomain.preferredDefinition: Yes or No response to a question coded as 1 (Yes) or 2 (No).

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

ValueMeaning.preferredDefinition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

Concepts.definition: The non-affirmative response to a question.

ValueMeaning.changeDescription: Updated to add NCIt concept relationship. Updated VM Short Name to be the Public ID to be consistent with current convention for VM Short Name - DW 10-03-2022
ValueMeaning.administrativeNotes: 2022.12.29 Alt VM added per ticket request CADSR0001837. ak

RepresentationTerm.preferredDefinition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation. Indicators determine or aid in determining whether or not certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied. (On-line Medical Dictionary)

Concepts.definition: An event, entity or condition that typically characterizes a prescribed environment or situation and determines or aids in determining whether certain stated circumstances exist or criteria are satisfied.

DataElement.changeDescription: Curated to support NCI caAERS integration with Rave 7.2014 D.Reeves
